name: AASHALATA VICTORIA WILKINSON MEMORIAL CHARITABLE TRUST
briefDescription: The goal of the organization is to create an environment in the community where attitude, knowledge, skills and information help the members to inculcate a shift in perception, and where through educational and skill development participation they present themselves as an active, healthy and productive part of society. The aim is to provide the community members reasonable opportunities whereby they get conducive environment to realize their potential. For the realization of this purpose the programme expects to achieve following objectives within stipulated time.Non-formal EducationRemedial Education ProgrammeVocational Training
